tha-ap49:1.4_0: which had been done with by the cloth.
tha-ap49:2.4_0: she rises up above the air.
tha-ap49:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap49:3.4_0: and the fruit of his bed.
tha-ap49:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap49:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhaṇḍagāma.
tha-ap49:7.1_0: The seventh part of the senior monk who had been brought out.
